author: Special Correspondent
text:
A large number of students from different schools participated in the ‘Tiruppavai and Tiruvembavai’ recitation and essay writing competition held in connection with the Paavai Festival here on Saturday.

The event was organised by the Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowments (HR and CE) Department.

Edappadi K. Palanisamy, Minister for State Highways and Minor Ports, inaugurated the competition. V. Sampath, District Collector, and S. Soundappan, Mayor, were present.

The Minister gave prizes to 36 students who won first three places. Participation certificates were given to all the others.
title: Competitions held
